presets.name: Polaris (Default)
presets.desc: The default and recommended curve. Decently balanced.

presets.name: RoboTop
presets.desc: The curve used by RoboTop, the predecessor to Polaris. Starts fine, but gets absurdly difficult.

presets.name: Generous
presets.desc: Too hard to level up? This curve is a little more on the friendly side.

presets.name: Linear
presets.desc: Completely linear. Set XP per message to 100-100 to level up exactly every 100 messages.

presets.name: Exponential
presets.desc: Not too easy, not too difficult. And it scales really smoothly.

presets.name: Ultra Minimalist
presets.desc: 1 XP per message, level up every 100 messages. Alternatively, I also recommend a 12 hour cooldown where you level up every 10 messages!

presets.name: Minecraft
presets.desc: Minecraft's XP curve changes a bit depending on your level, but this is the curve from level 0-15. Close enough. I recommend 3-11 XP per message, which is how much a Bottle o' Enchanting grants.

presets.name: Arcane
presets.desc: What a mysterious curve that definitely doesn't come from another bot!

presets.name: Definitely not Mee6
presets.desc: I can assure you that this oddly specific curve was not lifted from that one bot people don't like. Also last time I checked, you can't own a cubic function.

difficultyRatings.35000: Are you out of your mind
